reviewText:
I can't say enough about the freshness of this music.  Each song is unique and carries a timely message that will speak to your heart.  I originally heard two songs on an online Southern Gospel radio station, then had to find out more about this group.

If you buy/download the CD, you won't be disappointed!
Great Gospel songs and always with a great message. My favorite is "Forgiven" but all the songs are good. Excellent harmonies and fun arrangements.
Great talent, and vision.  After attending a concert, I couldn't wait to download their music.  Thanks gentlemen for your harmonious gift.

We bought this cd and our whole family thoroughly enjoys it!!  These guys are great examples for my kids to look up to. The Ball Brothers have some excellent harmony in all their songs!  Definitely worth the money!
I enjoyed every song!  I love that the Ball Brothers are bringing Gospel music back to the younger generation as well as the older!  They are great young Christian men living their lives for Christ!
New sound.
excellent group
Fantastic, love this music!!!!
grreat
I loved the one song on the album so much that I ordered the album itself.
I was sent a u-tube video of the song It's about the cross and that is why I bought the album and I am very please with it. The music is beautiful.
Wow! can these brothers sing!  Absolutely love the song "It's About the Cross"!!!
Excellent album!  I've listened to it over many times.
Awesome music. Harmonies are fantastic!
Love it
Absolutely wonderful sound and God-given talent!
I am trying to cancelled this last purchase that was made on March 32,2016
Love the harmony & message
Ball Brothers are a very talented group of men who sing a variety of music that is uplifting, God glorifying, Christ centered and refreshing to your spirit. Buy it!
I just love all their songs . It touches my heart and reach up for worship! I wish Ball Brothers will come to Vancouver, Washington for a concert.
